EmailTemplate.name: Managing a Sales Team Next Step
EmailTemplate.subject: Managing a Sales Team| Next Steps
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you so much for your passion, commitment to your development, your team’s development and the success of WEX! I had such a great week with you all and I look forward to seeing your final plans. As promised, here is the email capturing your next steps in completing the program. The 2020 Strategic Plan Template is attached. I also attached the PowerPoint version for those managers who would like to present this to your teams at the sales meeting in 2020.
I will go ahead and schedule a reminder on your calendars for the dates below. As we discussed during training, blocking time on your calendar will allow you to focus and complete your plan.
PHASE 3: Follow -Through
A. Follow-Through Project:
· Email David Stearns and Kathryn Connolly first draft plan by November 1, 2019 for feedback.
· Submit Final 8-Step Plan to Direct Manager, David Stearns and Kathryn Connolly by December 1, 2019.
· Review your plan (1x1) with manager by December 6, 2019.
I hope you all enjoy rest and relaxation this weekend. Please don’t hesitate to call me with questions.
Thank you
Kathryn
